title: ‏I Will Fall With The Emperor
summary:
"There can only be one sun."
"Two suns will only burn and kill the empire's people."

Alexar, the great wizard who commanded the empire, after being betrayed by his close friend Gillian Terzios who he trusted and followed, was reborn again as a master swordsman on the outskirts of a small country.

Alexar, the great wizard, moves to seek revenge on Gillian, his close friend and the only nine-star prosecutor of the continent.

title: Our gap
summary: Because Rein was a weak and simple beast tamer, he was expelled from the hero's group but that didn't stop his desire to be an adventurer. By taking simple quests afterwards he has a destined encounter with a strong cat girl.

title: Return of the Martial Arts Genius
summary:
Demons came pouring from a portal that appeared out of nowhere and caused the Cataclysm. But all hope is not lost thanks to the Awakeners, people who can fight these demons. 

Lee Jun, a D-rank Awakener, is one of them. He fought demons heroically, but as someone who inherited nothing from his family, he could only go so far. 

As Jun Lee’s life slowly whittled away, a system message appeared, informing him that a special martial arts route had opened...

title: The Reincarnation of the Forbidden Archmage
summary: One day, dungeons suddenly appeared. Humans with awakened skills then set out to face these dungeons in search of hope and riches. Our protagonist, Saeki, having no skills, is considered incompetent; in order to earn enough money for the treatment of his little sister with an incurable disease, he decided to become an adventurer. Saeki has a secret, in his previous life he was the most powerful mage. Since his reincarnation he has to level up to regain his former powers. This is the story of an incompetent who will turn the world upside down with his power!

title: Yeonwoo’s Innocence
summary:
Yeon Woo possesses such a delicate appearance that he could be mistaken as a female student. However, he has a secret crush on the school idol, Kang Haesol. But the shy and timid Yeon Woo has never said a word to her…

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5483716), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=752532)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/yanyudechunqing/list?title_no=1786&page=1)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romance/yeonwoo/list?title_no=2335&page=1)

title: What Happens When the Second Male Lead Goes on Strike
summary:
When Yeseo Jung wakes up one day, he finds himself trapped inside the body of Jesse Venetiaan, the ill-fated second male lead of a mega-hit fantasy romance novel *I Quit My Job, Then I Became the Princess Bride*.

It turns out this second male lead is destined to die at war, trying to protect the male lead. Yeseo’s goal is to avoid getting entangled with the main characters and survive until the war is over, all while searching for a way to return home safe and sound. 

But the female lead, Christelle, and the male lead, Cedric, keep approaching him…

---

**Original Novel:** [Chapters](https://ridibooks.com/books/425193499), [Volumes](https://ridibooks.com/books/425233591)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=9174594), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=803518)

title: Mightiest Melee Magician
summary:
Sensing shifts in mana, successfully manifesting it, and attending the most prestigious school at the top of his class at a young age, Ruin Ardell is on track to become a great mage. Everything was going smoothly until he discovered that he had a condition preventing him from expelling mana. 

Ruin’s tumble from grace gave those jealous of him the opportunity to toy with him. But in the depths of his despair, he discovers a miracle in the form of a system message.

title: Queen of the Veil
summary: I woke up to find myself transmigrated into a novel as the “background character that's doomed to die.” Now stuck in the body of a six-year-old, I’ve got some serious challenges ahead of me. But I’m not about to let fate have its way. Even if I have to become the villain, I’ll do whatever it takes to survive!

title: Putting My Life on the Line, I Go All-in on Luck Enhancement
summary:
Amano Kyouhei was a man abandoned by luck, but after hitting rock bottom, his fate finally begins to change. After a video of him defeating a monster goes viral on the internet, he becomes famous overnight.
This sudden reversal of fortune leads Kyouhei on a lifechanging journey of unforetold adventures. Will this stroke of luck bring him to true fortune, or will he face new trials to overcome…? The answer to that question will be found in his upcoming journey!

title: After relinquishing my talent, I became a favorite of the wizarding world
Me, The Heavenly Destined Villain
summary:
Immediately after Gu Changge realized he had transgressed into a fantasy world, the world's protagonist, and fortune's chosen, vowed to take revenge on him. Envied by all, not only is the female lead head over heels for him, but he's also treated as a distinguished guest wherever he goes. Fortunately, Gu Changge's prestige and power are superior to everyone else's, so shouldn't it be easy to trample on a mere fortune's chosen?

Hold on… There’s a system dedicated to milking and harvesting the protagonist? Gu Changge smirked. “Seems like even fate wants me to fulfill my destiny as the villain of this world!”

title: The Villainess Just Wants to Live in Peace!
summary:
Ouga Vellet, the eldest son of the infamous corrupt lordly Vellet family, is a reincarnator. Having been taken advantage of due to his kindness in his past life, he now revels in the life of a mischievous villainous heir. From then on, Ouga spared no compromise, pushing the limits of "tyranny" to achieve his ambitions.

"Wow, Ouga-sama, you're amazing!"

...Just for "arrogant behavior," his reputation seems to soar without his control? The curtain rises on a life of misconceptions and misconceived saintliness!

title: The Mafia Nanny
summary: Being an Elite Nanny is simple: protect the charge, obey the principle, and don’t get emotionally attached. Easier said than done when Davina’s first client is a dangerously compelling Venetian underboss who’s determined to get under her skin. What he wants from her, she can’t imagine, but Gabriel Angelini drags her back into the glittering world of organized crime she thought she’d left behind forever. She might get answers about her past if she digs deep enough, but can she protect Mikey from his father’s ambitions and keep her heart from getting tangled up in their treacherous web?

title: Only for Love
summary:
Rintarou, the boy I've been friends with since we were small. Large, grim, popular. He turned down a girl again… What a waste!

“No, because I love you.”

…Huh? What!? That's the first time I've heard about this!!! W-w-w-why me-

Damn…!!! I can't believe he would confess to me. I feel like I lost and it's frustrating. Now that it's come to this, I'll test him and see if he's good enough to be my boyfriend!!

title: I Tried To Live A Good Life, But!
summary:
The boy Leopin was born with unnaturally high dexterity. From an early age, he used his dexterity to contribute to his peers in a variety of crafts. Leopin and his friends entered the Royal Pioneer Academy. However, during the "Ritual of Ability Development" at the entrance ceremony, the status given to Leopin was disastrous.

"Occupation: Unemployed."
"All statuses except dexterity remain at their initial values and do not grow."
"Skill is dexterous, master of none."

Leopin's classmates exiled him because he had nothing to offer other than his dexterity. Leopin is placed in the "Special Training Class", a class for failures. Leopin is left all alone. However, he realizes that the skill he has been given, "Poor Dexterity," has an unexpected performance. That is...

You can convert your dexterity status to any other status.
You can change your occupation to any one you want.

The first thing Leopin did was to become a lumberjack. First, Leopin changed his job to "Lumberjack" to get wood from the forest. He then became a carpenter and built the most magnificent house of all. He became an Appraiser to identify rare items, and a Battle Axe User to fight off students from other classes who tried to attack him. Become a Ranger to explore dungeons and a Ninja to get through traps with ease. Leopin, alone (solo), had gained enough power to do everything.

As Leopin continues to be a warrior, he is adored by his childhood friend, a saint, and admired by a beautiful alchemist, and his activities become even more well known. On the other hand, the classmates who expelled Leopin regret their decision to do so when they witness Leopin's abilities. Their home remains a shack, they are unable to explore, and they gradually lose their place in the school and are ruined.
___
**Explanation:** the skill is not "poor dexterity", but "dexterous poor", which is the Japanese equivalent to a Jack of all trades, master of none; since they can do a bit of everything, they are "dexterous", but since they have mastered none, they supposedly cannot make a living from it, hence they are "poor". Another manner of saying you have high dexterity is to be "handy", back-translated from DEX as in *manual* dexterity from early RPGs. "An unemployed handyman who does a bit of everything" just doesn't quite roll off the tongue.

title: Reborn as a Monster 2: Rise of the Beast God
summary: A thousand years ago, under the blood moon, spatial rifts opened, heralding the era of monsters! Countless monsters rampaged across the globe! Just as humanity was on the brink of complete extinction, the emergence of “Beast Spirit Masters” brought a glimmer of hope to all of humanity! With generations of inheritance and the development of “Beast Spirit Masters”, humanity successfully created a new civilizational order to combat the monster invasion! Lin Yuan, who was a top assassin in his previous life but was tragically betrayed and killed by his organization, transmigrates…

title: My bias gets on the last train
summary:
“Meeting her on the last train again today, if only I could talk to her!”
College student Lee Yeowoon works late and takes the last train every night.
Each time, he runs into Shin Haein, a woman carrying a guitar. As if by chance, as if by fate,
the two keep meeting and discover that their favorite artist is the indie musician “Long Afternoon.” They gradually grow closer and so the story began.

title: SSS Grade Saint Knight
summary: The game descended on reality, monsters run rampant, magical disasters overflow, everyone needs to choose a class and level up to become stronger. Zhou Yi who has been unremarkable until now awakened the S+ rank talent Protection of the Sacred Angel on the day of class awakening, turning his class into the hidden class Sacred Knight! Weapon blessing, angel blessing, honor blessing… With all sorts of buffs, Zhou Yi destroyed the space itself with just his aura. Who was it that said sacred knight is just a mundane class?

title: You Didn’t Say the Start of the Regression Was a Gate
summary:
Han Seo-ha is a warrior who fought to the end against the evil empress who ruled the world. She died in a final battle, but woke up in the past, the day she entered a portal called “Gate Dragon”. This portal was actually a virtual reality game that took people to a fantasy world full of monsters and dangers.

 She decided to use her knowledge of the future to survive and change the fate of the world but, she will have to face many obstacles and enemies who tried to stop her, Seo-ha will also find several allies and friends who helped her on her journey.

title: Extroversion of an Immortal
summary:
[Web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2494fq/)  
[Light Novel](https://over-lap.co.jp/Form/Product/ProductDetail.aspx?shop=0&pid=9784865546644&vid=&cat=NVL&swrd=)  
  
—————————————————————————-  
  
From Novel Updates:  
  
The so called 『Enjoy the Human Lives Show Humans Sent to Another World With a Cheat』was trending amongst the Gods. Kanbara Kanata, one of the chosen humans ended up incurring the Evil God’s wrath and as a result, was sent to the worst dungeon,《Cocytus》. But, in a place where he was supposed to lose his life, he met Lunaère, a self-proclaimed misanthropic immortal girl. He was saved by her, who then decided to train him ’till he could at least protect himself.  
  
「Master, I think… I’ve become strong enough.」  
  
「It’s Not enough! Erm, outside of this dungeon is a dangerous place you know!」  
  
「Seriously!? More dangerous than this place…」  
  
This is the story of Kanata who was trained by his master, who easily succumbed to loneliness, till he became the greatest hero of legend, and yet was unaware of it.

title: Fighting Ward
summary:
A high school student, Kang Sun-woo, single-handedly defeats a group of illegal loan sharks who came to his house. At the hospital, where he goes for treatment, he is invited by a mysterious man to participate in a suspicious fighting tournament with a huge cash prize.

The prize is crucial for the survival of his family. Sun-woo must survive the fight ward !

title: I Want to Maintain My Stepmother’s Character
Seabird and the Wolf
summary:
Just think of two boys, thinking they’re in the right place, comfortable in their everyday life. Nothing to break their plans for the future. And suddenly they crash on that other one, who is so different and far away from what they know that it blows up their world. But now someone is looking at them. Seeing them for the first time. And they are so moved and overwhelmed by that feeling that they are ready to give up on everything else, and escape from, they realize it now, what was a prison.

Because they’ve met each other, their respective worlds have come apart, it's like a collision. And now they are an anchor for each other, the only compass in this new world where they are lost.

title: Their Trap
summary: The unfortunate little Li Qian Luo accidentally married a man who happens to be a god tier wife defender. Welcome to how to get revenge on your ex-boyfriend!

title: The Grim Reaper Duke’s Obsessive Contract Mother
summary:
Killed by her own husband, the prince, Lady Amelie wakes up one year before her doomed marriage. Determined to change her fate, she proposes a contract marriage to Duke Gazelle Isaac—infamously known as the “Grim Reaper.”

His only condition?

She must bond with his emotionally scarred twins.

Surrounded by secrets and shadows, can Amelie rewrite destiny—for herself and the feared duke?

title: A Master, Who Woke up as a Concubine
summary: Once a notorious master of the deviant sects, Nyeonbi Cheon pays a hefty price for her romance with a man of a virtuous sect, Won Gae of the True-spirited Sword. As her lover poisons her to death with a dragonsbane fruit, Nyeonbi perishes with more questions than answers. When she wakes up, however, she finds herself in a different sort of peril, as she reincarnates in the body of Noble Lady Soyeo Cheon, a concubine of the imperial palace. As Soyeo, Nyeonbi must rely on her knowledge from her past life to navigate both intrigue and romance in the palace!

title: Doctor Hong’s Secret
summary: Hong Gye-dong, a genius doctor with mysterious eyes that can see a person's fate. In truth, "he" is a woman. One day, due to unavoidable circumstances, she accidentally shifts the drinking expenses onto a man she believed was just an ordinary guy and gets caught. Now, entangled with this dangerous man, who seems to have no visible fate, she finds herself entering the royal court! But the ordinary guy she thought he was turns out to be none other than His Majesty, the king of this nation...?

title: Reincarnated In a Cursed Game
summary:
“Women are such a pain. It’s easier to hang out with other guys.”

Our protagonist, a misogynistic high schooler, was run over by a middle-aged woman who wasn’t paying attention to the road while he was on his way to school one morning.

When he regained consciousness, he finds himself in an unfamiliar world where he has been reincarnated as Hawk Gold, a woman-loving, obese child of a wealthy family with no morals whatsoever perhaps due to his spoiled upbringing.

He began keeping his distance from the women who flock to him for money and power, including his beautiful maid, younger sister, and fiancée in this second life he was suddenly forced to live.

Being born in the ’00s, little did he know that the world he lives in is actually part of “Elements Eleven,” a classic bishoujo game released in the ’90s, and his character was supposed to sabotage them.
> (novelupdates)

title: The Duke’s Villainous Daughter Is Depressed
summary:
After passing out drunk on a cold night, I awake as a nameless young orphan girl. But she's not just any girl, she's a character from a novel I wrote in high school! Abused and sold at auction as a slave, I'm suddenly rescued by my father, Duke Henry Wensgrey, the story's original villain. Far from the wicked character I created, he's now a total fool for his daughter. But our relationship isn't the only thing that's changed, and I soon discover that this world isn't anything like what I wrote!

---
I possessed a character in a novel I had never finished writing when I was in high school. And then now I have the body of a supporting character instead of the main character. It was a seven-year-old orphan girl with no name… Having to suffer the abuse of others, until I got really tired and ran away from that place. But I was captured and sold as a slave. I thought my life was over… But the person who saved me was the novel's most prominent villain, Henriette.

He treats the emperor like a puppet. A person who has a reputation for being extremely cruel in the original and has a hobby of cutting the throat of aristocrats. …Is he my biological father? But other than that terrible reputation, living with him wasn’t bad either.

"Okay, my daughter. You can do whatever you want. If you want something, everyone in the family will do what you want."

Wait… I didn't write a novel like that in the first place?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%8B%B9-%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91%EA%B0%80%EC%9D%98-%EC%8B%A4%EC%84%B8-%EB%A7%89%EB%82%B4%EB%94%B8%EC%9E%85%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/3441), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60083487)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26382&contentId=382&platform=IA)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/131595)

title: Defense Breaker
summary:
Jihoon is pulled into a defense game. He’s forced to become the captain of the knights and defend the kingdom from monsters. 

But the wounds he received from people haven’t healed yet, so he refuses to protect the kingdom. 

Then suddenly, a new route opens up…

title: The Fake Bride Can’t Escape
summary:
A pushy romantic comedy about a god who has been sleeping for 200 years and a positive JK!

Yui, a JK who has been able to see ghosts since she was a child, has an unrequited love on a god whom she has never met but who is loved by all ghosts. She spends her time dreaming of meeting him someday, but then the god, who has been asleep for 200 years after his fiancée ran away from him, finally wakes up.

Yui immediately proposes to the god, but...?

title: Youngest Son of the NamGung Clan
summary:
Jin Runcandel was destined to become the head of his swordmaster clan. But despite his best efforts, he's banished for his shoddy swordsmanship. Though Jin eventually makes a contract with the god Solderet and is freed from the curse that hindered his abilities, he meets a rather unfortunate end. In the next moment, however, he awakens as a baby, long before his tragedy began.

Armed with a second chance and some new powers, Jin swears to fulfill his destiny and become the ultimate swordmaster!

title: Welcome to the Rose Mansion
summary: No summary available.

title: 24 Hours Resurrection of the Villainess
summary:
The mission window in front of me flashed.

A villainess possessed the body of a lady named Banpoon. A survival-type epic romance where people hide their identities and fall in love!

And the end of the secret relationship.
Who will ultimately win her heart and complete the mission?

title: The Bad Ending of an Otome
summary: One day, office worker Suzune (Reine) is reborn as Raine, the heroine of a "work-based otome game" that is too far away from romance. She wants to fall in love with a handsome man in this life! However, she finds herself in a world where there is a magical caste system, and to her surprise, she is the lowest rank! Her family treats her coldly and she is on the verge of being expelled from school. ...... Even so, she is undeterred by the "strong mentality" she has developed in her previous life. Practising magic, studying, and increasing the likability of her targets, she runs hard to avoid a bad end and get a sparkling school life! As Rene pushes forward with such a bright and positive attitude, her high-spec brother Julius, with whom she was supposed to be on bad terms, somehow begins to dote on her - or does he? A school fantasy about a strong mental heroine who is loved by everyone!

title: Healing Touch
summary:
"Sunbae, what have you been up to these last few nights?"  
  
Taeyoung, who is living with his hobae(his buddy), Junghoon, has a problem.  
He relieves himself while thinking of Junghoon every night, but can't finish.  
But what is..?! While they're drinking together, Junghoon offers to lend his hand…!

title: Tyrant of the Otherworld Prison: My Shadow Can Evolve Infinitely
summary: In the year 2035, rifts to alien realms tore through the world’s defenses. Swarms of insectoids and beastkin ravaged the land, and humanity struggled to survive through the strength of “Evolvers.” Li Yi was betrayed by his teammates during an attack by alien beings and left for dead. On the brink of death, he awakened the “Titan Shadow” System—his shadow could evolve without limits! It could devour ores to enhance defense, tear through enemies to form deadly blades, and even split into an army of shadow soldiers… From insect hives to haunted lands, wherever his shadow passed, enemies were shredded into pulp. This is the revenge of the weak—begun with a shadow that devours all.

title: A Way to Protect the Lovable You
summary:
Finally, it was their first night.

Leticia whispered, leaning her forehead against his chest, "As expected, is it too far? Should I get closer?"

Dietrian barely swallowed a groan. His hand grasping Leticia's shoulder was shaking with a sweet faze, but she didn't notice.

"I know that you're uncomfortable. But please bear with me until my mother comes."

Dietrian hated Leticia. It was natural as Leticia's mother killed his family. She had never doubted the fact. So she didn't know, how badly his face was distorted by her words.

"You just have to put up with me for half a year. Then, I will divorce you as you wish."

At the word 'divorce,' he grit his teeth.

---
Despite being the daughter of the Holy Empire’s most revered divine leader, Leticia is rumored to be a ruthless, bloodthirsty tyrant. The thing is… none of the rumors are true! After years of living as her vindictive mother’s scapegoat, Leticia is ultimately cursed to die if she doesn’t kill her beloved husband, King Ditrian, with her own two hands. But when the clock miraculously resets to mere days before their wedding, she gets a second chance to save not only Ditrian, but his entire kingdom. This time, will the world recognize the real Leticia before it’s too late, or is history doomed to repeat itself?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8B%A4%EC%A0%95%ED%95%9C-%EA%B7%B8%EB%8C%80%EB%A5%BC-%EC%A7%80%ED%82%A4%EB%8A%94-%EB%B0%A9%EB%B2%95/2485), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home/56704518)

**Official Translations:**
* English: [Radish](https://radishfiction.com/stories/17978), [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/saving-my-sweetheart/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%8F%AA%E6%83%B3%E5%AE%88%E8%AD%B7%E6%BA%AB%E6%9F%94%E7%9A%84%E4%BD%A0/171)
* [French / Français](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/la-sainte-et-le-dragon)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Way-to-Protect-the-Lovable-You/129)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/72384)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%98%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%98%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%B9%E0%B9%89%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5/157)

title: Heavenly Grand Archive’s Young Master
summary:
The soul of the charming and imposing Martial Arts Alliance Leader, Hu-Gong, suddenly wakes up in the body of a young man.

That young man’s name is Beom-Hang. He’s the young master of the ‘Heavenly Grand Archive’, one of the three major archives of the Jianghu, yet he is a sorry excuse of a person.

To determine why his soul has swapped bodies, Hu-Gong begins to train Beom-Hang’s body. When the possessed young master of the Heavenly Grand Archive’s movements are totally different from how they used to be, it starts to attract the attention of the Jianghu...

title: Cheating Men Must Die
summary:
Why torment scumbags for just a moment when you can do so forever? Join Su LuXia as she transmigrates into countless worlds with her ‘Supporting Female Character’s Counterattack System’ to unleash vengeance upon the deplorable male and female leads using a variety of tactics! 

Su LuXia: "The only thing that brings me comfort is the tears of remorse from scumbag men and the agonizing groans of despicable women who can't get what they want." 

System: "Has My Esteemed Host learnt to reel back her vengeful spirit? Nope, I guess not."

title: It’s not a case of being loved
summary: No summary available.

title: Full-Time Awakening
summary:
As the captain of the Divine Legion and the strongest Awakener, Bai Yi is betrayed by a comrade, witnessing all his teammates die before his eyes. Only then does he realize he has always been a pawn of those in power. Having lost everything, he is reborn 20 years ago, back to his middle school days before awakening.

At that time, his family and teammates are still alive. To save them, to avenge the betrayer, and to overthrow the entire corrupt ruling system, he embarks on a lonely path of strength.

title: If You Want a Cheeky Sorceress
summary:
“I’m sorry, I’m sorry, Princess.”
The friend who killed my family.
“I know that you were very kind to me. I know that you cared for me very much. But what can I do?”
He branded me with the slave’s brand on his shoulder and cried.
“I wish you could die without smelling Adelia’s scent. That’s my wish.”
I, who had lost everything, also wanted to die like that.
I was put in a small box and sold, and on my way, I was saved by a man like a tiger who came with flames.
“Yes, Princess. Chew my fingers. Eat and swallow something to at least put up with my damned ridicule. Put your nails in my face.”
Why are you trying to save me when you saved me?
“I kissed these lips. This neck. These arms and legs, the tips of my toes. I rubbed my body without leaving a single one out.” Why do I, who couldn’t protect even one family member, react to your flame?

A woman who wanted to die met a man who wanted to save her, and decided to live.
With only one goal in mind: to pull the legs of those who pushed her into hell, and roll through the fires of hell together.

title: Mistaken for a Wicked Woman!
summary:
“Don’t you think it’s stupid to be crazy in love?”

Queen Laetitia was executed on the scaffold. For she had done evil things to make his lover turn her infatuated husband. However, she thought she was dead, but for some reason, she had returned back in time and her second life began.

“I won’t fall in love in this life. I’m going to live a peaceful life by becoming a sober student with glasses!”

I will be taken. After that, for some reason, Camillus' raging love affair began…?!

I’ll somehow survive with these glasses…!!

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0744gz/)

**Original Web Publication:** [Comic Days](https://comic-days.com/episode/4856001361054105850), [NicoVideo](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/62861), [Pixiv Comic](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/8591)

title: The Young Wife
summary: I possessed the body of the distant ancestor of the male lead in a martial arts novel where he dominates everything. To faithfully fulfill my role of supporting him, I worked myself to the bone and established the greatest family. After that, I peacefully closed my eyes. "What? My family has collapsed?!" When I opened my eyes again, 300 years had passed. The family I had painstakingly built was on the brink of ruin. On top of that, the male lead I dedicated my life to cheering for was about to enter a humiliating political marriage with the villainess from the original story. But the biggest problem was... "Why did I become that villainess!"

title: The Circumstances of an idiot
summary:
When spring came, when the colorful wildflowers budded in the wide meadows, Irene had to struggle with anguish.

"Hmph..."

A tickling sensation from a secret place. When she went into heat, she couldn't do anything for a week. Worse yet, she couldn't find a male to share her estrus with.

Meanwhile, Knox caught a whiff of a sweet scent on the breeze blowing in from somewhere. The scent of a female in heat.

He pulled back Irene's robe, and her snow-white hair spilled out. The corners of his tightly pressed lips lifted.

"A female anthromorph... Come with me."

title: The Turn-Bound Mage
summary:
Ever since Kang Seol was a child, he's had strange dreams where he and several people wear masks while playing "World of Eternity," a board game full of quests and adventures. And although Seol was great at the game, he was never able to win. But now, his dreams have become reality, and humans have become game pieces!

Humanity's only hope is for Seol to recall what he did in his dreams to survive. Even though he's never won, will he be able to turn the tables and finally make his way to victory?
